# TC05 - cancel outside cancellation deadline

## Step 02: block (getrooms_block)

### API Request
**Endpoint:** `POST /api/flows/block`  
**Headers:**  
- `Authorization: Bearer ***`

```json
{"flowId":"de91a319-39ed-4a0c-8e94-9f593b43a3b6","offerToken":".Iuf4dfUXsB7nen6uMRimZnwcwZoX5oHy5fqu5MXVWNw"}
```
